key_risks: Legal disputes with Gartner and non-compete litigation
High market competition from larger consulting firms
Economic sensitivity tied to corporate spending
Client dependency on a limited number of large clients
Data privacy and cybersecurity compliance risks
controversies: Pending lawsuit with Gartner, Inc. (Case No. 23-7832)
Non-compete litigation with former employees (Case No. 3:23-cv-688)
environmental_issues: Integration of sustainability and ESG considerations into advisory services
social_issues: Employee retention challenges due to non-compete litigation
Commitment to employee development and innovation
governance_issues: Legal compliance risks related to non-compete agreements
Data privacy and cybersecurity regulatory compliance
